title: LeBron James To Return To Cleveland Cavaliers
teaser: Brian Bull of WCPN in Cleveland joins us with details on the NBA star's decision.
contentencoded:
NBA star LeBron James tells Sports Illustrated he will return to the Cleveland Cavaliers. Brian Bull of WCPN in Cleveland joins Here & Now’s Robin Young with details.

Read LeBron’s piece in Sports Illustrated, “I’m Coming Home”

Guest

  • Brian Bull, reporter for WCPN in Cleveland, Ohio. He tweetsÂ @bcbull.
